cmd='/home/yxh/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/cmake/data/bin/cmake;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS= -std=c++11 -fPIC -fopenmp;-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=;-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=-O3 -DNDEBUG;-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=-g;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE=-O3 -DNDEBUG;-DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG=-g;-DENABLE_STATIC=ON;-DENABLE_SHARED=OFF;-DWITH_SIMD=OFF;-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/yxh/文档/yolov5/Open3D/3rdparty_install;-DCMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE=ON;-GUnix Makefiles;<SOURCE_DIR><SOURCE_SUBDIR>'
